string-array.name: server_array
string-array.item: hampager.de (インターネット。デフォルト)

resources.string: 名前またはメールアドレスを入力
ヘルプは準備中です!\n このページは間もなく作成されます。

DAPNET is an international amateur radio paging network developed by the Amateur Radio Group at the RWTH Aachen University. In order to participate and use this app, you need to be a valid amateur radio operator and have an account at hampager.de. If you do not have a an account yet, sign up below for a new ticket with \"New DAPNET Account\" as the help topic.

The operators of these pages take the protection of your personal data very seriously. We treat your personal data confidentiality and in accordance with the statutory data protection regulations and this data protection declaration.

The use of our website is usually possible without providing personal data. Insofar as personal data (e.g. name, address, ham radio call sign or email address) is collected on our website, this is always done on a voluntary basis as far as possible. This data will not be passed on to third parties without your express consent. This does not include the distribution of data within the network for its intended operation.

We would like to point out that data transmission over the Internet (e.g. when communicating by email) can have security gaps. In HAMNET in particular, your personal data is also transmitted by law in open language, i.e. without encryption. It is not possible to completely protect data from access by third parties. You expressly agree to this.
Special declaration under Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (General Data Protection Regulation)

By participating in the paging network provided by this page, you give a voluntary consent that your personal data and in particular also the paging that you send will be saved, processed for the intended operation and shared within the DAPNET network. You can request information about the data you have stored, its correction or deletion at any time. Please request this via the support ticket system.

Esp. Give the above voluntary consent by submitting a request in the ticket system to grant user access or access from a broadcaster.
Special use of the data of a participating broadcaster

If you have a transmitter entered in DAPNET, you voluntarily agree that the transmitter data you provide (in particular the position, height and output power) on this website or in other networks or platforms (e.g. the APRS network in the Amateur radio) are processed and / or published. This is defined as an intended operation. You expressly accept this definition.
